name: Vagrant Heroes
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys or WASD to move the player. Z to confirm / interact. X to return / cancel.

The Game

Vagrant Heroes is a classic RPG with a turn based battle system. Follow three companions that have never met before and have now banded together after experiencing trouble at sea.

This game is very much work in progress. This demo is intended to give a brief preview into the state of the current game engine and open up to some early feedback.

Music

Music composed by Aaron Krogh
